{{Location Intro|{{Lang|'''Bubu Pharmacy'''|zh=不卜庐|zh_rm=Bùbǔ-lú|zh_tl=Not-Divining Hut}}|description=<p>Bubu Pharmacy is renowned as the "finest pharmacy in all of [[Liyue]]." The pharmacy is known to be quite busy during and after the [[Lantern Rite]].</p><!--

--><p>Entering through the door at the eastern side of the building allows entry to the back room, which contains living quarters.</p>}}

The Viewpoint for Yujing Terrace can be found on the roof of the pharmacy.

==Shop==
{{Vendor|Herbalist Gui}}

==Members==
* [[Baizhu]]: The boss of Bubu Pharmacy. He is a playable {{Dendro}} [[character]].
* [[Qiqi]]: An employee in the pharmacy. She is a playable {{Cryo}} [[character]] who is also a [[zombie]].
* [[Herbalist Gui]]: An employee in the pharmacy. He is an [[NPC]] who handles the [[#Shop|shop menu]] of the pharmacy.

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{zh|不卜|Bùbǔ}} literally means "not divining" or "not practicing fortune-telling." This could suggest that the pharmacy's medicines and practices are based on modern scientific methods rather than folk beliefs.
* On the other hand, as an idiom, {{zh|难料|rm=bùbǔ}} can mean "unpredictable."<ref>Zdic.net: [https://www.zdic.net/hans/%E4%B8%8D%E5%8D%9C {{zh|《汉典》不卜}}]</ref>
** During the Archon Quest ''[[Farewell, Archaic Lord]]'', [[Paimon]] cites the Liyue proverb "All things are random, and... so how are you supposed to predict anything?" in the pharmacy.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Guizhong (Quest)}}</ref> This may be a reference to Bubu Pharmacy's name.
